name: piwigo-bootstrap-darkroom
description: A Piwigo theme based on Bootstrap 4
author: Thomas Kuther

scripts.build: npm-run-all build:bootstrap build:bootstrap-darkroom build:theme build:material build:bootswatch
scripts.build:bootstrap:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootstrap-default.scss css/bootstrap-default/bootstrap.css && postcss --config node_modules/bootstrap/build/postcss.config.js --replace css/bootstrap-default/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/bootstrap-default/bootstrap.min.css css/bootstrap-default/bootstrap.css
scripts.build:bootstrap-darkroom: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootstrap-darkroom.scss css/bootstrap-darkroom/bootstrap.css && postcss --config node_modules/bootstrap/build/postcss.config.js --replace css/bootstrap-darkroom/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/bootstrap-darkroom/bootstrap.min.css css/bootstrap-darkroom/bootstrap.css
scripts.build:theme: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/theme.scss theme.css
scripts.build:material:css: for i in amber blue brown darkroom deep-orange deep-purple indigo light-green lime purple red teal; do node-sass --importer=node_modules/node-sass-tilde-importer --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/material/_${i}.scss css/material-${i}/bootstrap.css && postcss --config node_modules/bootstrap/build/postcss.config.js --replace css/material-${i}/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/material-${i}/bootstrap.min.css css/material-${i}/bootstrap.css; done
scripts.build:bootswatch: for i in cerulean cosmo cyborg darkly flatly journal litera lumen lux materia minty pulse sandstone simplex sketchy slate solar spacelab superhero united yeti; do node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootswatch/_${i}.scss css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.css && postcss --config node_modules/bootstrap/build/postcss.config.js --replace css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.min.css css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.css; done
